short_summary: Department of National Defence ("DND") is soliciting sealed bids",
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at Canadian Forces Supply Depots (CFSD) in Edmonton (Alberta) and Montreal (Quebec) upon receipt of a Call-Up against the Standing Offer.
full_summary:
# **Packaging Items Tender Notice**

## **Reference Number**
PW-22-01006149

## **Solicitation Number**
W8486-217437/A

## **Publication Date**
2022-09-02

## **Tender Closing Date**
2022-10-14T14:00:00

## **Notice of Proposed Procurement**

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for various packaging items. The Canadian Forces Supply Depots (CFSD) in Edmonton and Montreal are the delivery locations.

### **Item Descriptions**

| **Item Number** | **Description** | **Unit of Issue** | **Delivery Location** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | GSIN: 8155, NSN: 8155-21-1025209, BOX, SHIPPING | EA | Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal |
| 2 | GSIN: 8155, NSN: 8115-21-841-9984, BOX, INTERMEDIATE PACKAGING | EA | Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal |
| 3 | GSIN: 8105, NSN: 8105-21-855-3225, BAG, PLASTIC | EA | Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal |
| 4 | GSIN: 8115, NSN: 8115-855-3226, BOX, SHIPPING | EA | Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal |
| 5 | GSIN: 8155, NSN: 8155-21-1025209, BOX, SHIPPING | EA | Department of National Defence, 7 CFSD Edmonton |
| 6 | GSIN: 8155, NSN: 8115-21-841-9984, BOX, INTERMEDIATE PACKAGING | EA | Department of National Defence, 7 CFSD Edmonton |
| 7 | GSIN: 8105, NSN: 8105-21-855-3225, BAG, PLASTIC | EA | Department of National Defence, 7 CFSD Edmonton |
| 8 | GSIN: 8115, NSN: 8115-855-3226, BOX, SHIPPING | EA | Department of National Defence, 7 CFSD Edmonton |
